name: Association for Rehabilitation under National Trust Initiative of Marketing (ARUNIM)

address: Bada Bazar Road, Old Rajinder Nagar,

briefDescription: ARUNIM (Association for Rehabilitation Under National Trust Initiative of Marketing) is a path-breaking initiative of the National Trust, a statutory body under the Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment. At ARUNIM we strive towards creating livelihood opportunities for people with moderate to severe disabilities, where none exist.
